full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify for the Construction of a Containment Cell at Skinner's Cove

**Call Number**: WS3715349694-Doc3759633611

**Publication Date**: November 21, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: December 14, 2022, at 14:00 EST

**Amendment Date**: December 7, 2022

**Procurement Category**
• [CNST - Construction]

**Trade Agreements**
• Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Delivery**
• Nova Scotia

**Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
[Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada]

**Contact Information**
• Name: Adam Beaumaster (SPAC/PSPC)
• Email: adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Description of Requirements
PWGSC is seeking tenderers for the construction of a containment cell area and a new access road at Melville for Skinner’s Cove SCH, Pictou County, Nova Scotia. The construction activities are to be completed 8 weeks after award of the contract. Bid Security will be a requirement for this tender.

### Evaluation Criteria
The lowest bid will be selected on the basis of responsiveness, completeness, and compliance with the bid instructions.

### Tender Requirements
Tenderers are required to submit their bids electronically. Bid submissions must be received on time to be considered, and any bids received after the deadline of December 14, 2022 at 14:00 EST will be deemed non-responsive. 

The successful bidder will be required to submit a performance bond within a designated timeframe. 

### Important Notes
Please ensure that you have carefully reviewed the tender documents before submitting your bid. Late bid submissions will not be considered.

Detailed tender documents, including a complete set of specifications, terms, and conditions, are available for download on [insert link]. For additional information or clarification, please contact Adam Beaumaster at the above-mentioned address.
